entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1 except minus 7 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1 except minus 7 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
